id.description: Canid Genotype (MJ 40). CEO of a trading company that consists of just the PCs.

aspects.aspect: From Bastard Canid Throwaway to Secret CEO

stunts.stunt: Your sense of smell is far superior to that of humans. You can track and recognise people by scent, and gain a +2 bonus on Investigate and Notice rolls related to smell. (FH pg 10)

phase.events: Rich canid, paid by family to stay away from home. The Dinkley family owns (among other things) a huge portion of Daedelus Corporation.

character.notes: Trouble: Enemies of the Family? (Or within the family?) Questions: Are you just an aimless drifter, or do you have some plan for your life?
